mapper.select: select warehouse_id, name, location, is_in_default, is_out_default, permitted_category from w_warehouse
mapper.insert: insert into w_warehouse(name, location, is_in_default, is_out_default, permitted_category) values (#{name}, #{location}, #{isInDefault}, #{isOutDefault}, #{permittedCategory})
mapper.update: update w_warehouse set name = #{name}, location = #{location}, is_in_default = #{isInDefault}, is_out_default = #{isOutDefault}, permitted_category = #{permittedCategory} where warehouse_id = #{warehouseID}
